fast3d.simple.controls

Class SFPUControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.control.Control
      • fast3d.control.SimpleControl
        • fast3d.simple.controls.SFPUControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.ContainerListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SFPUControl
extends SimpleControl
    SimpleFirstPersonUserControl
    does not check collisions of the camera, not appropriate for games
    WASD to move: W-forward D-right, UP/DOWN for nicking-camera-rotation, LEFT/RIGHT or mouseDrag-cameraRotation, R for up, F for down moving in moveSpeed, rotating in rotSpeed ; speeds may be set directly as fields, L to log stats
    max-rotationX = +- Math.PI/3, no max-rotationY
    Author:
    Tim Trense

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double keyRotSpeed
      the speed for rotation around x and y axis in radiant per key press on LEFT or RIGHT
      default is rotSpeed * 50
      double moveSpeed
      the speed for moving along the look-direction-axes of the camera in length-units per key-press-tick
      default is 0.5
      double rotSpeed
      the speed for rotation around x and y axis in radiant per mouse-move-pixel
      default is 0.001
      double rotX
      the current rotation of the camera look-direction around the x-axis
      default at start is 0 (means look along Vector3d.forward())
      double rotY
      the current rotation of the camera look-direction around the y-axis
      default at start is 0 (means look along Vector3d.forward())
      double zoom
      the current zoom-factor of the camera
      default at start is 1 (means no zoom)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SFPUControl(SimplePanel3d p3d)
      calls super and sets rotX and rotY to 0d
